attributes.action: Make both the Serven Bridges Free to all Welsh People
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When leaving the Welsh Borders via the M4 we are not charged but we then have to pay to get into our own country.

There are plenty of toll charges around the country and the severn bridges have to be amongst the highest.

Severn River Crossings PLC should be consulted and asked to reduce their charge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
